mapper.sql: msg_id, receiver_id, sender_id, `type`, is_read, is_deleted, title, content, order_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET is_read = #{isRead}, update_time = NOW() WHERE msg_id = #{msgId} AND is_deleted = 0 -- 仅更新未删除的消息
UPDATE message SET is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, update_time = NOW() WHERE msg_id = #{msgId}
UPDATE message SET is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, update_time = NOW() WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `message` WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND is_read = 0 AND is_deleted = 0 -- 利用联合索引idx_receiver_status提升查询效率
